message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a valuable asset worth more than $100 to anyone who appreciates its quality and utility. Considering its exceptional value, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $95. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a discounted rate. I believe you won't find a better deal elsewhere, and I'm confident it will meet your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer.
